```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE)

library(plotly)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
date <- format(Sys.Date()[1], "%B %d, %Y")[1][1]

dia <- read.csv("./diabetes_prediction_dataset.csv")
dia$diabetes <- as.factor(dia$diabetes)
levels(dia$diabetes) <- c("Non-diabetic", "Diabetic")
```
## February 9, 2024

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=5}
fig <- plot_ly(data=dia, x=~age, y=~bmi, z=~HbA1c_level, type="scatter3d",
               mode="markers",
               color=~diabetes, colors = c('#099F00','#BF382A')) %>%
       add_markers() %>%
       layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Age'),
                           yaxis = list(title = 'BMI'),
                           zaxis = list(title = 'A1C Level')))
fig
```
